resources.string: Don\'t use this app while driving.
Use only test data while running AT&T ARO Data Collector.

AT&T ARO Data Collector STARTED! \n\nPlease navigate to the application you would like to test. After testing of your application is complete, please return to AT&T ARO to stop the ARO Data Collector.

Built from Public code supplied by 
 AT&T Developer Program 
 
 http://developer.att.com/aro
SD card is either not available or it is mounted. Please check the SD card before running AT&T ARO-Data Collector.
SD Card mounted, AT&T ARO Data Collector trace session terminated.
AT&T ARO Data Collector failed to start!
AT&T ARO Data Collector trace collection stopped.
AT&T ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started with flight mode on.
AT&T ARO Data Collector trace session stopped due to flight mode being turned ON while there was no active WIFI connection.
AT&T ARO Data Collector trace session can\'t be started with both wifi and mobile turned off.
SD Card memory full, stopping AT&T ARO Data Collector.
Trace folder name should not have special characters or spaces.
Trace folder already exists! Do you want to overwrite existing trace?

You do not have administrator-level permission (i.e., root level access) on this device. It is recommended that you use a device that is dedicated to experimentation and testing since rooting may have an adverse impact on device performance and/or manufacturer warranty.
AT&T ARO Data Collector instance is already running on device!
AT&T ARO Data Collector launch from the Analyzer is already in progress
